vote.title: Authorize an increase in the purchase from Crosstimbers Capital, Inc., of approximately 5,353 square feet of land, located near the intersection of Gloyd and Childers Streets for the Cadillac Heights Phase II Project - Not to exceed $27,744.33, increased from $16,800.00 ($15,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $1,800.00) to $44,544.33 ($43,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses no to exceed $1,554.33) - Financing: Land Acquisition in Cadillac Heights Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Fund)
vote.description: Authorize an increase in the purchase from Crosstimbers Capital, Inc., of approximately 5,353 square feet of land, located near the intersection of Gloyd and Childers Streets for the Cadillac Heights Phase II Project - Not to exceed $27,744.33, increased from $16,800.00 ($15,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $1,800.00) to $44,544.33 ($43,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses no to exceed $1,554.33) - Financing: Land Acquisition in Cadillac Heights Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Fund)
